data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 22333, Version Hash: 76f317c0de4b335c5f692213a60f2fe4d1679c4e
data.actual_result: the "you have unsaved settings" bar will pop up even if you don't have the required permissions to change it
data.expected_result: either nothing should happen or the setting the other person changed will update on your screen.
data.short_description: "unsaved settings" button in server settings pops up without changing anything
data.steps_to_repro: - enter the server overview of a server - ask someone else to change a setting of the server - the client will think you made a change and the unsaved settings notification will pop up
